original_title: Cannot change govt. by taking to the streets: RW
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe said today that a government can only be changed through a parliamentary election and taking to the streets was not an option for that, the President's Media Division said.
The President made this remark while participating in the Air Force cadets and other officers Passing Out Parade at the Trincomalee Air Force Base today.
